abstract: Oscar Diaz, former welterweight boxing champ who sustained career-ending brain injury during 2008 fight, dies at age 32.
lead_paragraph: Diaz, a former welterweight champion from San Antonio, sustained a debilitating brain injury during a fight nearly seven years ago and spent two months in a coma.

headline.main: Oscar Diaz, Boxer Injured in ’08, Dies at 32

snippet: Diaz, a former welterweight champion from San Antonio, sustained a debilitating brain injury during a fight nearly seven years ago and spent two months in a coma.
